3014.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Participants In The Lawfit Challenge From The Mississippi Department Of Wildlife, Fisheries And Parks (team Wildlife) For Taking Top Honors And Setting New Records In The 16th Annual Lawfit Challenge Held In Pearl, Mississippi.

3015.title: Recognize Glendora Producer Mike Sturdivant III for "Mississippi 2017 Swisher Sweets/Sunbelt Ag Expo Farmer of the Year" Award.
3015.description: A Concurrent Resolution Joining The Mississippi Delta Agriculture Community In Honoring Glendora Producer Mike Sturdivant Iii Upon His Receipt Of "mississippi's 2017 Swisher Sweets/sunbelt Ag Expo Farmer Of The Year" Award.

3016.title: Recognize Pole Vault Star Sam Kendricks for winning the Gold Medal at the 2017 IAAF World Championships in London.
3016.description: A Concurrent Resolution Congratulating Former Oxford High School And University Of Mississippi Pole Vault Standout Sam Kendricks For Winning A Gold Medal At The 2017 Iaaf World Championships In London, England.

3017.title: Declaring that pornography is a public health hazard and recognizing the need for education and research.
3017.description: A Concurrent Resolution Declaring The Legislative Policy That Pornography Is A Public Health Hazard And Recognizing The Need For Education, Prevention And Research.

3018.title: Honoring Mississippi Actor Morgan Freeman for receiving the SAG Life Achievement Award at 2018 Screen Actors Guild Ceremony.
3018.description: A Concurrent Resolution Honoring Internationally Acclaimed Mississippi Actor Morgan Freeman Upon His Receipt Of The Sag Life Achievement Award At The 2018 Screen Actors Guild Awards Ceremony And Thanking Him For His Humanitarian And Civic Contributions To The State Of Mississippi.

3019.title: Recognize Southern Mississippi Alum Tori Bowie for spectacular win of two Gold Medals in the 2017 IAAF World Championships in London.
3019.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing Former University Of Southern Mississippi Track-and-field Standout And Sandhill Native Tori Bowie For Winning Two Gold Medals In The 2017 Iaaf World Championships In London, England.

3020.title: Commend and congratulate Noxubee County High School "Tigers" Football Team for winning their fifth MHSAA Class 4A State Championship.
3020.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Noxubee County High School "tigers" Football Team And Coach Tyrone Shorter For Winning Their Fifth Mhsaa Class 4a State Championship.

3021.title: Constitution; change terms of office of members of State Board of Education from nine to four years.
3021.description: A Concurrent Resolution Proposing An Amendment To Section 203 Of The Mississippi Constitution Of 1890 To Change The Terms Of Office Of The Members Of The State Board Of Education From Nine To Four Years; And For Related Purposes.

3022.title: Constitution; remove the electoral vote requirement for Governor.
3022.description: A Concurrent Resolution Proposing To Amend The Mississippi Constitution Of 1890 By Amending Section 140 And Repealing Sections 141 And 142 To Abolish The Requirement That The Governor Be Elected By Electoral Vote Of The Mississippi House Of Representatives And To Provide That The Person Receiving The Highest Popular Vote At The General Election Shall Be Governor.

3023.title: Joint Rules of Mississippi Legislature; amend to provide that Legislature shall not convene on Easter Sunday.
3023.description: A Concurrent Resolution To Amend Joint Rule No. 40 To Provide That The Legislature Shall Not Convene On Easter Sunday.

3128.title: Commend Columbus High School "Falcons" Boys Basketball Team for winning Class 6A State Championship.
3128.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Columbus High School "falcons" Boys Basketball Team And Coach Anthony Carlyle For Winning The Mhsaa Class 6a State Championship.

3129.title: Commend Olive Branch High School "Conquistadors" Boys Basketball Team for winning first 5A State Championship.
3129.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Olive Branch High School "conquistadors" Boys Basketball Team And Coach Eric Rombaugh For Winning Its First-ever Class 5a State Championship.

3130.title: Suspend rules; DFA to study suitable location for DPS headquarters in Jackson Metro area.
3130.description: A Concurrent Resolution Suspending The Deadlines For The Purpose Of Requesting The Drafting, Introduction, Consideration And Passage Of A Bill Entitled "an Act To Require The Department Of Finance And Administration To Conduct A Site Selection Study To Determine Suitable Locations In The Jackson Metropolitan Area For The Headquarters Of The Department Of Public Safety; To Require The Department To Include In The Study An Analysis Of Public And Private Property In The Jackson Metropolitan Area And File A Report Regarding Its Findings With The Legislature By Not Later Than December 31, 2018; And For Related Purposes."

3131.title: Commend Coahoma High School "Red Panthers" Boys Basketball Team for winning second straight 2A State Championship.
3131.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Coahoma High School "red Panthers" Boys Basketball Team And Coach Derrick Moore For Winning Their Second Consecutive Class 2a State Championship.

3132.title: Designate March 20, 2018, as "Undergraduate Research Day in Mississippi" and recognize "Posters in the Rotunda" project.
3132.description: A Concurrent Resolution Designating March 20, 2018, As "undergraduate Research Day In Mississippi" To Emphasize The Value Of Scholarly Inquiry And The Application Of Research To The Education Of Future Leaders And To Recognize The "posters In The Rotunda" Project.

3133.title: Commend Raymond High School "Rangers" Boys Basketball Team for winning consecutive 4A State Titles.
3133.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Raymond High School "rangers" Boys Basketball Team And Coach Tony Tadlock For Winning Consecutive Mhsaa Class 4a Championships.

3134.title: Commend Ingomar Girls Basketball Team for third straight 2A Title.
3134.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Ingomar High School "lady Falcons" Girls Basketball Team And Coach Trent Adair For Their Third Straight Class 2a State Title.

3135.title: Recognize musical excellence of USM Symphony Orchestra Conductor Jay Dean upon his retirement.
3135.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing The Musical Excellence And Distinguished National Reputation Of Dr. Jay Dean, Music Director And Conductor Of The Southern Mississippi Symphony Orchestra At The University Of Southern Mississippi, Upon The Occasion Of His Retirement.

3136.title: Commend East Rankin Academy "Lady Patriots" Varsity Basketball Team for winning the MAIS AAAA Division II State Championship.
3136.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The East Rankin Academy "lady Patriots" Varsity Basketball Team And Coach Rod Delaney For Winning The Mais Aaaa Division Ii State Championship.

3137.title: Recognize effective public service of Mississippi Oil and Gas Board Executive Director Lisa Ivshin on her retirement.
3137.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing The Record Of Effective Public Service Of Mississippi Oil And Gas Board Executive Director Lisa Ivshin On The Occasion Of Her Retirement.

3138.title: Recognize legacy of Gary Herring, First Presbyterian Day School Head of School, on his retirement.
3138.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing The Legacy Of Leadership And Dedication Of Gary J. Herring, Head Of School Of First Presbyterian Day School, On The Occasion Of His Retirement.

3139.title: Recognize the accomplishments and civic leadership of Dr. Lee Gardner Royce, 19th President of MC, on his retirement.
3139.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing The Accomplishments And Civic Leadership Of Dr. Lee Gardner Royce As The 19th President Of Mississippi College On The Occasion Of His Retirement.

3140.title: Commend Saltillo High School "Tigers" Girls Cross Country Team for winning 2017 Class 5A State Championship.
3140.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Saltillo High School "tigers" Girls Cross Country Team And Coach Charles Covington For Winning The 2017 Class 5a State Championship.

3141.title: Recognize the lasting legacy of retiring United States Senator Thad Cochran.
3141.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing The Lasting Legacy Of Retiring United States Senator Thad Cochran.

3142.title: Commend members of Phi Theta Kappa's All-Mississippi Academic Team on the occasion of "Mississippi Phi Theta Kappa Day."
3142.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending The Members Of Phi Theta Kappa's All-mississippi Academic Team On The Occasion Of "mississippi Phi Theta Kappa Day."

3143.title: Extend condolences on the passing of Greenwood Attorney and former Leflore County Supervisor Alix Sanders.
3143.description: A Concurrent Resolution Extending The Condolences Of The Mississippi Legislature To The Bereaved Family Of Longtime Greenwood Attorney And Former Leflore County Supervisor Alix Sanders.

3144.title: United States Constitutional Amendment Convention of the States under Article V; apply for certain restraints on federal government.
3144.description: A Concurrent Resolution Applying To The Congress Of The United States To Call An Amendment Convention Of The States Pursuant To Article V Of The United States Constitution.

3145.title: Recognize achievements and sport management service of retiring USM Professor Dr. Dennis Phillips.
3145.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing The Academic And Professional Achievements And Community Service Of Retiring University Of Southern Mississippi Sport Management Professor Dr. Dennis Phillips And Commending His Legacy Of Leadership.

3146.title: Driver's licenses; state opposition to the public policy of suspension for nondriving offenses.
3146.description: A Concurrent Resolution Stating The Legislature's Opposition To The Enactment Or Enforcement Of A Law That Meets The Requirement Of 23 Uscs Section 159, Which Requires That The Driver's Licenses Of Persons Convicted Of Drug Offenses Be Revoked Or Suspended For A Period Of Six Months, Without Regard To Whether The Offense Was Related To The Operation Of A Motor Vehicle.

3147.title: Commemorate the 50th Anniversary of the assassination of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., on April 4, 1968.
3147.description: A Concurrent Resolution To Commemorate The 50th Anniversary Of The Assassination Of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., On April 4, 1968.

3148.title: Commend St. Andrew's Episcopal School "Saints" Boys Basketball Team for first State Championship in school history.
3148.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The St. Andrew's Episcopal School "saints" Boys Basketball Team And Coach Brian Cronin For Winning Their First 3a State Championship In School History.

3149.title: Designate July 13, 2018, as "Collector Car Appreciation Day in Mississippi."
3149.description: A Concurrent Resolution Designating July 13, 2018, As "collector Car Appreciation Day In Mississippi" And Recognizing That The Collection And Restoration Of Historic And Classic Cars Is An Important Part Of Preserving The Technological Achievements And Cultural Heritage Of The United States.

3150.title: Welcome NASA Astronaut Stephanie D. Wilson on Stennis Space Center Capitol Day March 21, 2018.
3150.description: A Concurrent Resolution Welcoming Nasa Astronaut Stephanie D. Wilson To The State Of Mississippi On The Occasion Of The Partners For Stennis Space Center Capitol Day.

3151.title: Recognize MSU/ROTC graduate Air Force Colonel Damon Feltman upon his promotion to Brigadier General.
3151.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing Colonel Damon S. Feltman, Son Of Mckinley And Gail Feltman Of Desoto County, Mississippi, And A Mississippi State University Rotc Graduate, Upon The Occasion Of His Promotion To The Rank Of Brigadier General And Extending The Congratulations Of The Legislature On This High Honor.

3152.title: Commend Germantown High School Girls Soccer Team for first 5A State Title.
3152.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Germantown High School "lady Mavericks" Soccer Team And Coach Michael Guidry For Winning Its First 5a State Championship.

3153.title: Commend Starkville High School "Yellow Jackets" Girls Basketball Team for winning 6A State Championship.
3153.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Starkville High School "yellow Jackets" Girls Basketball Team And Coach Kristie Williams For Winning The 2018 Mhsaa Class 6a State Championship.

3154.title: Commend Pine Grove High School "Lady Panthers" Girls Basketball Team for winning 1A State Championship.
3154.description: A Concurrent Resolution Commending And Congratulating The Pine Grove High School "lady Panthers" Girls Basketball Team And Coach Katie Bates For Winning Their Second Consecutive Class 1a State Championship.

3155.title: Recognize Cathy Northington as COO of Mississippi Economic Council.
3155.description: A Concurrent Resolution Recognizing Cathy L. Northington As The New Chief Operating Officer Of The Mississippi Economic Council Representing The Statewide Business Community.

3157.title: Congratulate MSU "Lady Bulldogs" Women's Basketball Team for second consecutive NCAA Tournament "Final Four" appearance.
3157.description: A Concurrent Resolution Congratulating The Mississippi State University "lady Bulldogs" Women's Basketball Team And Wbca "coach Of The Year" Coach Vic Schaefer For Advancing To Its Second Consecutive Ncaa Tournament "final Four" Appearance, And Recognize Teaira Mccowan, Victoria Vivians And Morgan William, And All Team Members For A Special Season.

3158.title: Mourn the passing of prominent Journalist Wayne Sims "Joe" Rutherford of Tupelo.
3158.description: A Concurrent Resolution Mourning The Passing Of Prominent Mississippi Journalist Wayne Sims "joe" Rutherford, Recognizing His Legacy And Extending The Condolences Of The Legislature To His Family.
